id: total return swap whose return leg underlier is an equity observable
name: total return swap whose return leg underlier is an equity observable

id: Equity swaps can be physically or cash settled.
name: Equity swaps can be physically or cash settled.

id: terms that are invoked if special dividend and memorial dividends are applicable
name: terms that are invoked if special dividend and memorial dividends are applicable

id: EquitySwaps.rdf version of this ontology was modified to add the concept of a high-level equity swap as well as an equity volatility swap per the ISO CFI standard and to add references to the CFI where appropriate.
name: EquitySwaps.rdf version of this ontology was modified to add the concept of a high-level equity swap as well as an equity volatility swap per the ISO CFI standard and to add references to the CFI where appropriate.

id: An equity volatility swap is a measure of the amount by which an asset's price is expected to fluctuate over a given period of time; it is normally measured by the annual standard deviation of daily price changes.
name: An equity volatility swap is a measure of the amount by which an asset's price is expected to fluctuate over a given period of time; it is normally measured by the annual standard deviation of daily price changes.

id: EquitySwaps.rdf version of this ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) rather than the OMG's Languages, Countries and Codes (LCC), eliminating redundancies in FIBO as appropriate.
name: EquitySwaps.rdf version of this ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) rather than the OMG's Languages, Countries and Codes (LCC), eliminating redundancies in FIBO as appropriate.

id: equity swap that has at least one leg whose underlier is a dividend stream
name: equity swap that has at least one leg whose underlier is a dividend stream

id: dispersion leg whose underlying is an equity index
name: dispersion leg whose underlying is an equity index

id: ISO 10962, Securities and related financial instruments - Classification of financial instruments (CFI) code, Fifth edition, 2021-06-15
name: ISO 10962, Securities and related financial instruments - Classification of financial instruments (CFI) code, Fifth edition, 2021-06-15

id: A price return equity swap is similar to a total return swap, except that dividends are not passed through to the buyer).
name: A price return equity swap is similar to a total return swap, except that dividends are not passed through to the buyer).

id: EquitySwaps.rdf version of this ontology was modified to fix spelling errors.
name: EquitySwaps.rdf version of this ontology was modified to fix spelling errors.

id: version of this ontology was modified to eliminate deprecated swap elements.
name: version of this ontology was modified to eliminate deprecated swap elements.

id: return swap whose return leg underlier is an equity observable
name: return swap whose return leg underlier is an equity observable

id: floating leg of a dividend swap
name: floating leg of a dividend swap

id: EquitySwaps.rdf version of this ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) Annotation Vocabulary rather than the OMG's Specification Metadata vocabulary, and to move the definition of an underlier and the related property, has underlier, to financial instruments so that these concepts are also available for use in relation to pool-backed securities.
name: EquitySwaps.rdf version of this ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) Annotation Vocabulary rather than the OMG's Specification Metadata vocabulary, and to move the definition of an underlier and the related property, has underlier, to financial instruments so that these concepts are also available for use in relation to pool-backed securities.

id: The underlier for the leg can be any of (1) dividend stream for a single stock, (2) change in value for a single share, (3) change in value for a basket of shares, (4) change in value for an index, (5) value of a dividend stream for a basket of shares, or (6) comparison of the change in value of a given share or basket or index against something else - for example, a single share against an index, which is the thing you are cross-correlating with the volatility of the share.
name: The underlier for the leg can be any of (1) dividend stream for a single stock, (2) change in value for a single share, (3) change in value for a basket of shares, (4) change in value for an index, (5) value of a dividend stream for a basket of shares, or (6) comparison of the change in value of a given share or basket or index against something else - for example, a single share against an index, which is the thing you are cross-correlating with the volatility of the share.

id: correlation swap that allows one to hedge risks associated with the observed average correlation of a collection of underlying equity products
name: correlation swap that allows one to hedge risks associated with the observed average correlation of a collection of underlying equity products

id: swap whose payments are linked to the change in value of an underlying equity (e.g. shares, basket of equities or index) or its cashflow
name: swap whose payments are linked to the change in value of an underlying equity (e.g. shares, basket of equities or index) or its cashflow

id: dispersion swap that is a forward contract on the variability of movements in the price of its underlying equity observable
name: dispersion swap that is a forward contract on the variability of movements in the price of its underlying equity observable

id: This ontology defines concepts specific to swap contracts in which one leg gives some form of return on an equity asset, including dividend returns, total asset returns equity dispersion and correlation measurement terms. Many of these return calculations are based on a variety of calculation methods and may vary widely.
name: This ontology defines concepts specific to swap contracts in which one leg gives some form of return on an equity asset, including dividend returns, total asset returns equity dispersion and correlation measurement terms. Many of these return calculations are based on a variety of calculation methods and may vary widely.

id: return leg whose income is based on an equity observable
name: return leg whose income is based on an equity observable

id: Dividend swaps include those that are fixed-term contracts between two parties where one party makes an interest rate payment for each interval and the other party pays the total dividends received as pay-out by a selected underlying asset.
name: Dividend swaps include those that are fixed-term contracts between two parties where one party makes an interest rate payment for each interval and the other party pays the total dividends received as pay-out by a selected underlying asset.

id: date period over which the sum of all qualifying dividends paid by the relevant issuers as identified in the swap terms is calculated
name: date period over which the sum of all qualifying dividends paid by the relevant issuers as identified in the swap terms is calculated

id: dispersion swap in which the parties agree to exchange payments based on the difference between (i) the realized variance of the price changes of a specified equity underlier over a stated observation period and (ii) a fixed amount of variance that is agreed when the contract is executed
name: dispersion swap in which the parties agree to exchange payments based on the difference between (i) the realized variance of the price changes of a specified equity underlier over a stated observation period and (ii) a fixed amount of variance that is agreed when the contract is executed

id: dispersion leg whose underlying is a defined set of constituents of a given equity index
name: dispersion leg whose underlying is a defined set of constituents of a given equity index

id: An equity variance swap is a forward swap that uses the variance (being the volatility squared) of an underlying's price movement over a period as the basis for the payoff calculation.
name: An equity variance swap is a forward swap that uses the variance (being the volatility squared) of an underlying's price movement over a period as the basis for the payoff calculation.

id: EquitySwaps.rdf version of this ontology was modified to replace content that is now available in the OMG Commons Ontology Library (Commons) v1.1 (FND-380).
name: EquitySwaps.rdf version of this ontology was modified to replace content that is now available in the OMG Commons Ontology Library (Commons) v1.1 (FND-380).
